column1: 2006: The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth II:
:Glóin is a major character. Still present in Rivendell after the Council of Elrond
column2: he teams up with Glorfindel on a campaign throughout Eriador and  Rhovanion. He is a fierce dwarf with a reddish brown beard.

column1: 2007: The Lord of the Rings Online:
:Glóin is a non-playable character who established a camp just north of Rivendell in the Misty Mountains in an attempt to keep Goblins and Dourhands from attacking the Elven city.
